WSUS32 KKCI 272155 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 42C 
VALID UNTIL 2355Z 
SD 
FROM 60WNW DPR-60NNW RAP 
DVLPG LINE TS 20 NM WIDE MOV FROM 25020KT. TOPS TO FL270. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 272355-280355 
AREA 1...FROM 30SSE COU-30NE LIT-TXK-70W ACT-50S DLF-50SSE 
MRF-LBB-50WSW TUL-60W BUM-30SSE COU 
REF WW 149. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM DLL-50WNW PMM-50NW AXC-30SSW DBQ-DLL 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 3...FROM 40WNW DIK-BIS-ANW-BFF-CZI-40WNW DIK 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

VALID UNTIL 2355Z 
TX 
FROM 20W TTT-20E TTT 
DMSHG LINE TS 20 NM WIDE MOV FROM 28035KT. TOPS TO FL340. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 272355-280355 
AREA 1...FROM 30SSE COU-30NE LIT-TXK-70W ACT-50S DLF-50SSE 
MRF-LBB-50WSW TUL-60W BUM-30SSE COU 
REF WW 149. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM DLL-50WNW PMM-50NW AXC-30SSW DBQ-DLL 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 3...FROM 40WNW DIK-BIS-ANW-BFF-CZI-40WNW DIK 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
